definition: to see for oneself/to see with one's own eyes
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: His denial that he had witnessed the accident dumbfounded me.
sentences.chinese: 他否認曾親眼目睹這一事故的發生把我驚呆了。

sentences.english: If Haiti, you'll witness the the ugly side Western paternalism.
sentences.chinese: 而在海地，你會親眼目睹到西方家長作風的醜陋面。

sentences.english: He witnessed in person the murder.
sentences.chinese: 他親眼目睹了這場謀殺。

sentences.english: Recently I witnessed a men's doubles game between players with a fairly high skill level.
sentences.chinese: 最近親眼目睹了一場較高水平的男子雙打比賽。

sentences.english: Fans would undoubtedly flock to arenas to witness it all in person.
sentences.chinese: 球迷們毫無疑問將湧向球館親眼目睹球星的風采。

sentences.english: This week you can see the Galilean satellites for yourself.
sentences.chinese: 本週，您能親眼目睹加利略衛星。

sentences.english: The situation Piller and Smith describe is one that I've seen myself.
sentences.chinese: 查爾斯和史密斯描述的情況是我所親眼目睹的。

sentences.english: I saw firsthand how good schools and a good education can transform lives.
sentences.chinese: 我親眼目睹了良好的學校和教育是如何改變命運的。

sentences.english: I witnessed this with my own eyes from the rooftop of a building.
sentences.chinese: 我從這座建築的天台上親眼目睹了這一切。

sentences.english: It was the accrued wisdom and resoluteness of evolution that I was witnessing, airborne above the Platte.
sentences.chinese: 我親眼目睹進化累積的智慧和信念在普拉特上空傳播。

sentences.english: Were you there when the pharaohs commissioned the Sphinx?
sentences.chinese: 你是否親眼目睹法老任命斯芬克斯？

sentences.english: Recently, dicast rather the Sir revealed to this report he personally witnesses of tie bird one act.
sentences.chinese: 近日，市民寧先生透露了他親眼目睹的打鳥一幕。

sentences.english: Accidental opportunity, her saw with one's own eyes is witnessed big China by usurious chase after debt.
sentences.chinese: 一次偶然的機會，她親眼目睹大華被高利貸追債。

sentences.english: An eyewitness told the BBC what he'd seen on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 一名目擊者向BBC講述了他在週五親眼目睹的情景。

sentences.english: Your mother is a doctor and educator, and she has seen this firsthand.
sentences.chinese: 你母親是一位醫生兼教育人士，她曾親眼目睹這些。
